basics.name: Charles Hundley
basics.label: Lead Cook (Cook III)
basics.summary: Charles Hundley has well over nine years of overall cooking and kitchen experience. Four years of lead cook experience. Three years as a certified trainer. He has gained various amounts of knowledge in the culinary industry and has taken his career to many different levels throughout his cooking career...

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prep menu for the day service. Delegate all our breaks throughout the shift...
highlights: Started out as a prep cook and moved to Cook Lead/Cook III within six months.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Make sure our assigned kitchen has the proper cook-ware each shift...
highlights: Promoted after my second contract with the cruise ship.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Cook and Prepare meals for our guest...
highlights: Started out as a prep cook in the back learning the menu for about two months then moved up to line cook for six months before I became a Lead Cook.

skills.name: Ability to Adapt to any situation
